channel.title: To bot or not to bot
channel.description: Are you guys botters? are you for botting or against it? i wanna hear some opinions. Myself am a botter.

item.title: To bot or not to bot
item.dc:creator: @Echo3 Echo_
item.description:
@Echo3 wrote:

[quote=“g s e, post:30, topic:377309”][quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=473212.msg3460737#msg3460737 date=1294453675]

18 hours a day soul wars.

I wish I could keep my computer on for that long.
[/quote]

LOL. and isnt sw botting suicide?[/quote]

Depends on whether your using a paid or free bot.

#define QUESTION ((2bot) || !(2bot))

Read full topic
item.source: To bot or not to bot

item.title: To bot or not to bot
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“abatssk8ter, post:26, topic:377309”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=473212.msg3464445#msg3464445 date=1294786850]

I’d rather have my pride and dignity than vast wealth.

[/quote]There is no pride in playing a MMORPG for hours straight.[/quote]
See how far 2 hours a day will take you.

Read full topic
item.source: To bot or not to bot

item.title: To bot or not to bot
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“abatssk8ter, post:26, topic:377309”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=473212.msg3464445#msg3464445 date=1294786850]

I’d rather have my pride and dignity than vast wealth.

[/quote]There is no pride in playing a MMORPG for hours straight.[/quote]

To you, perhaps. I personally still enjoy the feeling of achievement, even after playing this game off and on for nearly 6 years. Other times it’s just there to pass the time. Everyone has a different perception.

Read full topic

item.description:
@nicks wrote:

seriously i used to play runescape for fun i hated killing chaos druids to make like 1m per 4hours of non stop clicking now that i’ve tried botting i will never go back to legit. its 100% worth the risk.

item.title: To bot or not to bot
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

reyx7:

I don’t see why you guys risk botting. Sure, there are tens of thousands, even hundreds of thousands also doing it, but why take the risk? Alot of them have been getting banned lately. What happened to sitting some time aside, maybe do a quest for the ability to make money faster without botting. Yesterday I finished Swan Song, just so I could catch monks. I proceeded to catch monks for 2 hours and made about 250k, along with almost getting lvl 70 fishing. The game was meant to be not only fun, but the right to feel proud you earned a 99 skill, and not some SCAR script. That’s what this game is really about.

Yeh, but I play RS to PK only.

Read full topic
item.source: To bot or not to bot

I had that feeling hmmmm around 9 years ago and ended in 2005. no thanks lol

Alot of them have been getting banned lately. What happened to sitting some time aside, maybe do a quest for the ability to make money faster without botting. Yesterday I finished Swan Song, just so I could catch monks. I proceeded to catch monks for 2 hours and made about 250k, along with almost getting lvl 70 fishing. The game was meant to be not only fun, but the right to feel proud you earned a 99 skill, and not some SCAR script. That’s what this game is really about.[/quote]Who wants to waste even half an hour of there life playing runegay i mean runescape, when they can just bot then go do cool stuff like pk with the vast wealth.

Read full topic

item.title: To bot or not to bot
item.dc:creator: @s_3_3_m_3 s 3 3 m 3
item.description:
@s_3_3_m_3 wrote:

im a big-time botter, i bot atleast 4 accounts at a time. i currently am running 1 soul wars bot, 1 flax picker bot, and 2 green dragon killing bots, i have 2 computers and i run my bots until they are banned.

EDIT: Only have been banned twice, so i take breaks now hoping that it helps, but i hear that when you get reported it takes a screenshot, and thats how they tell if you are botting or not, idk…

Read full topic
item.source: To bot or not to bot

Also do you guys use breaks?[/quote]I don’t. And yeah i feel no accomplishment playing legit anymore ever since all these ridiculous updates.

item.description:

[quote=“xxlukexx, post:12, topic:377309”][quote author=Echo_ link=topic=473212.msg3461737#msg3461737 date=1294534555]
It’ s kinda hard to get anything done on RS without botting, unless you have 8 hours a day to sit on the computer and play games. So yeah, I bot alot ;D
[/quote]

Not really.[/quote]

Sure it is, the xp rates are slow and all the good money making spots are full of bots anyways, so why not join them?
